name: Project Chaos (Yrk06, Gonzalo Cabeza, Dash2)
description:
The prince of Darkness has requested that you conquer all land in order to prepare for his return.
Don't disappoint him, you have no other choice

Controls:

While on the world screen:

  • WASD to move the camera around
  • Left mouse button to open towns
  • Left mouse button to select and order an army to move
  • Right mouse button to deselect an army
  • Space bar to show/hide the ingame menu

In combat: 

  • Spacebar to roll the dice

Help Section:

  • What do I do?
    • In order to conquer the land you need manpower. Start by hiring some soldiers in towns
    • Already have soldiers? Create an army using the ingame menu (press spacebar if you don't see it)
    • Now that you have an army, use mouse left to select the army and guide it to an enemy controlled town
    • Once the combat starts, roll the D20 and hope for the best
    • Are there any soldiers you think deserves medals? retire them and they will pass knowledge forward and will increase the skills of your recruits
  • Stats:
    • Soldier:
      • Skill: controlls how good you soldier is, the higher their skill is, the smaller is the number you need on the dice
      • Age: younger soldiers can take more hits in battles
    • Towns:
      • Gold: each town will generate some amount of gold in taxes every other day, be sure to make use of it all for the well being of the citizens war machine
      • Recruit market: every 4 days new recruits will pop up at your towns, be sure to hire them and make your armies stronger
